data.name: PrivacyPolicyTitle
data.value: Privacy Policy

data.name: EffectiveDate
data.value: Effective Date:

data.name: IntroductionText
data.value: We are committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy outlines our practices regarding the collection, use, and disclosure of your information.

data.name: InformationWeCollectTitle
data.value: 2. Information We Collect

data.name: PersonalInformationTitle
data.value: Personal Information

data.name: PersonalInformationText
data.value: Information you provide that personally identifies you, such as your name, email address, and phone number.

data.name: AccountInformationTitle
data.value: Account Information

data.name: AccountInformationText
data.value: Details about your account, including login credentials and preferences.

data.name: FinancialInformationText
data.value: Payment details and transaction history.

data.name: UsageDataTitle
data.value: Usage Data

data.name: CookiesTitle
data.value: Cookies

data.name: CookiesText
data.value: Small files that are stored on your device to enhance your experience and provide personalized services.

data.name: HowWeUseInformationText
data.value: We use the information we collect for various purposes to provide and improve our services to you.

data.name: ProvideServicesTitle
data.value: To Provide Services

data.name: ProvideServicesText
data.value: We use your information to provide and deliver the services you request.

data.name: ImproveServicesText
data.value: We analyze your data to improve our services and develop new features.

data.name: CommunicateTitle
data.value: To Communicate with You

data.name: CommunicateText
data.value: We may use your information to contact you regarding updates, promotions, or customer service.

data.name: SecurityTitle
data.value: To Ensure Security

data.name: SecurityText
data.value: We implement security measures to protect your information from unauthorized access or disclosure.

data.name: LegalObligationsText
data.value: We may process your information to comply with applicable laws and regulations.

data.name: SharingInformationTitle
data.value: 4. Sharing Your Information

data.name: SharingInformationText
data.value: We may share your information with third parties in certain circumstances.

data.name: ServiceProvidersTitle
data.value: Service Providers

data.name: ServiceProvidersText
data.value: We may share your information with third-party service providers who assist us in operating our services.

data.name: AffiliatesTitle
data.value: Affiliates

data.name: AffiliatesText
data.value: We may share your information with our affiliates for business purposes.

data.name: LegalReasonsTitle
data.value: Legal Reasons

data.name: DataSecurityTitle
data.value: 5. Data Security

data.name: DataSecurityText
data.value: We take reasonable measures to protect your information from loss, theft, misuse, and unauthorized access.

data.name: DataRetentionTitle
data.value: 6. Data Retention

data.name: DataRetentionText
data.value: We retain your information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy.

data.name: AccessTitle
data.value: Access

data.name: AccessText
data.value: You have the right to request access to the personal information we hold about you.

data.name: CorrectionTitle
data.value: Correction

data.name: CorrectionText
data.value: You have the right to request that we correct any inaccuracies in your personal information.

data.name: DeletionTitle
data.value: Deletion

data.name: DeletionText
data.value: You have the right to request that we delete your personal information, subject to certain exceptions.

data.name: ObjectionText
data.value: You have the right to object to the processing of your personal information in certain circumstances.

data.name: DataPortabilityTitle
data.value: Data Portability

data.name: DataPortabilityText
data.value: You have the right to request that we transfer your personal information to another organization.

data.name: ChangesTitle
data.value: 8. Changes to this Privacy Policy

data.name: ChangesText
data.value: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page.

data.name: ContactUsTitle
data.value: 9. Contact Us

data.name: ContactUsText
data.value: If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy, please contact us using the information below:

data.name: Step1
data.value: Use this button to show/hide side navigation

data.name: Step2
data.value: Use this button to view/hide your profile information

data.name: Step3
data.value: Use this button to log out

data.name: Step4
data.value: Use this button to change light/dark theme

data.name: Step5
data.value: Use this button to enable/disable full screen mode'

data.name: Step6
data.value: Use this dropdown to switch language

data.name: Step7
data.value: Use this dropdown to switch currency

data.name: Step8
data.value: Use this button to restart the tour

data.name: Step9
data.value: Use the sidebar for quick navigation around the work panel

data.name: Step10
data.value: Have fun!
